sentences.en: Developed a half-century ago, GNP helped establish a common way among countries of measuring the change in economic output.
sentences.cn: 国民生产总值是半个世纪前制定的，它帮助各国建立了衡量经济产出变化的统一方式。

sentences.en: A half-century ago we lost Camus and gained Stipe.
sentences.cn: 半个世纪前，我们失去了加缪却得到了斯蒂普。

sentences.en: Rarely in the past half-century has Japan managed that.
sentences.cn: 过去半个世纪，日本很少能做到这一点。
